to-do-list.new-note-hint: Add a note or to-do item

new-artifact.title: New Artifact
new-artifact.instructions-text: Fill out the form below and click 'Save'.
new-artifact.name: Artifact Name
new-artifact.name-hint: Good names are short, descriptive, and pique interest
new-artifact.status-hint: Is it done yet? It's okay if it's only an idea or a work-in-progress. You can save it and finish it later.
new-artifact.narrative-hint: What story does this artifact tell about you? See the 'Guidance' section above for ideas about what to write here.
new-artifact.tags-hint: A good rule-of-thumb is that each artifact should have 3-5 key workd or phrases to describe and categorize it. Hit [enter] after typing each tag.
new-artifact.save-failure: There was a problem saving the artifact.
